synopsis: According to the official website, episode 4.5 of of Ikoku Meiro no Croisée will be included in the third volume of the Blu-ray & DVD. The episode streamed for a limited time on ShowTime, the official online streaming site for Ikoku Meiro no Croisée.

title.en: Croisée in a Foreign Labyrinth OVA
title.jp: Ikoku Meiro no Croisée The Animation: Ongakkai "Récital"
